opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Pennington County; Hon. Turner M. Rudesill, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Thos. G. Wall, of Sturgis, for Plaintiff and Appellant.
C.P. Cooper, of Lead, for Defendant and Respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Finding no prejudicial error in the record, the judgment and order appealed from are affirmed.
All the Judges concur.
